heroBlockSlider.label: Hero Block Slider
heroBlockSlider.description: The versatile hero slider: bold visuals, clear messaging, smart CTAs. Built for brand stories and campaigns.

placeholder.title: Instagram Feed Block
placeholder.hint: Configure the Instagram feed in the block settings

info.apiCredentials: API credentials (App ID, App Secret, Access Token) are loaded from plugin settings (Hero Blocks Extension Config).

postLimit.label: Number of Posts
postLimit.helpText: Number of Instagram posts to display initially (max. 12)

enableLoadMore.label: Enable Load More Button
enableLoadMore.helpText: Activates a button to load more posts

columns.label: Number of Columns (Grid)
columns.helpText: Number of columns in grid mode (1-4)

layoutType.label: Layout Type (Grid)
layoutType.helpText: Choose between uniform grid or masonry layout

showLikes.label: Show Likes
showLikes.helpText: Displays the number of likes for each post

showComments.label: Show Comments
showComments.helpText: Displays the number of comments for each post

navigationArrows.label: Navigation Arrows (Slider)
navigationArrows.helpText: Select the position of navigation arrows (none, inside, outside)

navigationDots.label: Navigation Dots (Slider)
navigationDots.helpText: Enable display of navigation dots below the slider

autoSlide.label: Auto Slide
autoSlide.helpText: Enable automatic sliding of the slider

speed.label: Slide Speed (ms)
speed.helpText: Speed of slide animation in milliseconds (100-1000)

categorySlider.label: Hero Block Category Slider
categorySlider.description: Category slider with images from selected categories

config.info: Slider settings (navigation, auto-slide, etc.) can also be configured in the block settings.

heroTwoColumns.label: Hero Two Columns Image & Text
heroTwoColumns.description: Two-column layout with image and text, parallax scroll effects and flexible background options.

layout.label: Layout (Mobile)
layout.helpText: Choose the column arrangement for mobile devices: image left or text left.

layoutDesktop.label: Layout (Desktop)
layoutDesktop.helpText: Choose the column arrangement for desktop devices: image left or text left.

layoutTablet.label: Layout (Tablet)
layoutTablet.helpText: Choose the column arrangement for tablet devices: image left or text left.

backgroundMode.label: Background mode
backgroundMode.helpText: Choose the background mode: No background, single image or two images.

backgroundLeftUseCss.label: Use CSS for left background
backgroundLeftUseCss.helpText: Enable this option to use custom CSS for the left background

backgroundLeftCss.label: CSS for left background
backgroundLeftCss.helpText: Custom CSS for the left background (e.g. gradients, colors)

backgroundRightUseCss.label: Use CSS for right background
backgroundRightUseCss.helpText: Enable this option to use custom CSS for the right background

backgroundRightCss.label: CSS for right background
backgroundRightCss.helpText: Custom CSS for the right background (e.g. gradients, colors)

scrollAnimationEnabled.label: Enable scroll animation
scrollAnimationEnabled.helpText: Enable parallax scroll effects for background images

scrollAnimationAngle.label: Scroll animation angle
scrollAnimationAngle.helpText: Angle for parallax animation in degrees (0-360)

elementLeftTranslateX.label: Left Element - Translate X
elementLeftTranslateX.helpText: Horizontal translation for the left element

elementLeftTranslateY.label: Left Element - Translate Y
elementLeftTranslateY.helpText: Vertical translation for the left element

elementLeftAnimate.label: Animate left element
elementLeftAnimate.helpText: Enable animation for the left element on scroll

elementRightTranslateX.label: Right Element - Translate X
elementRightTranslateX.helpText: Horizontal translation for the right element

elementRightTranslateY.label: Right Element - Translate Y
elementRightTranslateY.helpText: Vertical translation for the right element

elementRightAnimate.label: Animate right element
elementRightAnimate.helpText: Enable animation for the right element on scroll

elementLeftCss.label: CSS for left element wrapper
elementLeftCss.helpText: Custom CSS for the left element wrapper (e.g. padding, margin, background). Applied on desktop only, NOT on mobile.

elementRightCss.label: CSS for right element wrapper
elementRightCss.helpText: Custom CSS for the right element wrapper (e.g. padding, margin, background). Applied on desktop only, NOT on mobile.

imageContainerLeftCss.label: CSS for left image container
imageContainerLeftCss.helpText: Custom CSS for the left image container (.cms-image-container). e.g. height: 80%; object-fit: contain;

imageContainerRightCss.label: CSS for right image container
imageContainerRightCss.helpText: Custom CSS for the right image container (.cms-image-container). e.g. height: 80%; object-fit: contain;

audioFile.label: Audio file
audioFile.helpText: Optional: Audio file for background music or sound effects

minHeight.label: Minimum height
minHeight.helpText: Minimum height for the block (e.g. 500px or 80vh)

heroShoppingExperience.label: Advanced Theme Shopping Experience
heroShoppingExperience.description: Advanced shopping experience blocks with products and content (In Development)

config.inDevelopment: This block is currently in development and can be enabled via plugin settings.

twoImages.label: Hero Two Images
twoImages.description: Two images side by side with flexible layout options

mattInterfacesBranding.title: Developed by Matt Interfaces - Learn more about Shopware Hero Blocks

heroVideoExtended.label: Hero Video Extended
heroVideoExtended.description: Video hero block with angled text overlay and scroll animation

placeholder.selectVideo: Select a video in the block settings
placeholder.headline: Your Headline

heroVideoExtended.videoNotSupported: Your browser does not support the video tag.

config.videoHelp: Select or upload a video file (MP4 recommended, max. 2-5MB)
config.posterHelp: Image displayed before video loads or if video fails
config.autoplayHelp: Automatically play video when visible (muted required)
config.mutedHelp: Play video without sound (required for autoplay)
config.minHeightHelp: Minimum height for the block (e.g. 500px or 60vh)
config.overlayBackgroundColorHelp: Leave empty to use theme accent color
config.enableScrollAnimationHelp: Animates the overlay panel sliding in when scrolling into view

fileSizeWarning.title: Large Video File
fileSizeWarning.message: The selected video file is larger than 2MB. Large video files may impact page load times and user experience.
fileSizeWarning.hint: For best performance, we recommend video files between 2-5MB. Consider compressing your video or using a shorter clip.

heroFaq.label: Hero FAQ Block
heroFaq.emptyState: No FAQ entries available. Click on the gear icon to add FAQ entries.

config.title: Manage FAQ Entries
config.description: Add questions and answers for your FAQ block.
config.question: Question
config.questionPlaceholder: e.g. How long does shipping take?
config.answerPlaceholder: e.g. Shipping usually takes 2-3 business days...
config.noItems: No FAQ entries yet. Add your first entry.

heroMegaMenu.label: Hero Mega Menu
heroMegaMenu.description: Advanced mega menu navigation with categories, products and widgets

heroImageOverlay.label: Hero Image Overlay
heroImageOverlay.description: Full-width image with angled text overlay panel

config.overlayPositionHelp: Choose where the overlay panel appears on the image
config.overlayBackgroundColorHelp: Leave empty to use theme accent color
config.enableScrollAnimationHelp: Animates the overlay panel sliding in from outside when scrolling into view

helpText.displayMode: How should the image be displayed?
helpText.autoplayTimeout: Time in milliseconds until next slide

infoText.autoSlideMessage: Enabling this feature may make parts of your storefront inaccessible to users with disabilities. This may result in non-compliance with accessibility laws applicable in your jurisdiction (e.g., the European Accessibility Act). By proceeding, you acknowledge this risk and accept full responsibility.

heroSlider.label: Hero Slider
heroSlider.description: Hero slider element with image, headline, text and two CTAs

config.minHeightPlaceholder: Minimum height for the image (e.g. 400px or 50vh)
config.minHeightHelpText: Minimum height for the image (e.g. 400px or 50vh). Ignored when 'Full height' is enabled.
config.maxHeightPlaceholder: Maximum height for the image (e.g. 800px or 100vh)
config.maxHeightHelpText: Maximum height for the image (e.g. 800px or 100vh). Ignored when 'Full height' is enabled.
config.fullHeightHelpText: Automatically enables 100vh minus header height for desktop and mobile. Disables min/max height settings.
config.logoImageHelpText: Optional: Logo or image displayed before the headline. Used only on this slide.
config.logoPositionHelpText: Choose whether the logo is displayed inside the content area or outside (absolutely positioned).
config.logoTranslateXHelpText: Horizontal offset of the logo in pixels (negative = left, positive = right)
config.logoTranslateYHelpText: Vertical offset of the logo in pixels (negative = up, positive = down)
config.logoCustomCssHelpText: Additional CSS for the logo (e.g. max-width: 200px; top: 2rem;). Only applied when 'Outside' is selected.
config.mediaUploadHelpText: Select images for the hero slider (max. 200 KB recommended). Modern image formats (WebP, AVIF) are automatically compressed.

uploadSizeWarning.title: Large file detected
uploadSizeWarning.message: The file "{fileName}" is {size} KB (recommended: max. {maxSize} KB). Large files may impact load times.

config.headline: Headline
config.linkTypeHelp: Choose an external URL or link to products/categories/pages via the link picker.

label.minHeightHelpText: Minimum height for the image (e.g. 400px or 50vh)
label.isDecorativeHelpText: Marks images as decorative for screen readers

helpText.displayMode: How should the images be displayed?

config.infoText: API credentials (App ID, App Secret, Access Token) are loaded from plugin settings (Hero Blocks Extension Config).

category.label: Category
category.helpText: Select a category whose images should be displayed in the slider

config.info: Slider settings (navigation, auto-slide, etc.) can also be configured in the block settings.
config.noSlidesHint: Click 'Add Category Slide' to create your first slide.

customTitle.label: Custom Title (Optional)
customTitle.helpText: Leave empty to use the category name automatically

customImage.label: Custom Image (Optional)
customImage.helpText: Override category image with a custom image

customText.label: Custom Text (Optional)
customText.helpText: Optional descriptive text displayed below the category title

customLink.label: Custom Link (Optional)
customLink.helpText: Override default category link with a custom URL

navigationArrows.label: Navigation Arrows
navigationArrows.helpText: Select the position of navigation arrows (none, inside, outside)

navigationDots.label: Navigation Dots
navigationDots.helpText: Enable display of navigation dots below the slider

autoSlide.label: Auto Slide
autoSlide.helpText: Enable automatic sliding of the slider

speed.label: Slide Speed (ms)
speed.helpText: Speed of slide animation in milliseconds (100-1000)

displayMode.label: Display Mode
displayMode.helpText: Select the display mode for images (standard, cover, contain)

subcategoryLevels.label: Subcategory Levels
subcategoryLevels.helpText: Number of subcategory levels to include (0 = none, 1-5 = number of levels)

imageCount.label: Number of Images per Slide
imageCount.helpText: Select how many images should be displayed per slide (1-4)

imageWidth.label: Image Width
imageWidth.helpText: Select the image width (inner-full-width = within container, full-width = full width)

sw-settings-license-check.description: Professional CMS blocks for Shopware Shopping Experiences. Hero Slider, Two Columns layouts, and custom blocks built according to Shopware best practices.

features.heroSlider: Hero Slider - Multi-slide hero blocks with headlines, text, buttons, and images
features.heroTwoColumns: Hero Two Columns Image & Text - Two-column layout with flexible background options (Parallax scroll: coming soon)
features.heroVideoExtended: Hero Video Extended - Video hero blocks with headlines, text, and buttons (Coming soon)
features.heroInstagramFeed: Hero Instagram Feed Widget - Instagram feed integration for mega menu and custom blocks (Coming soon)
features.megaMenu: Mega Menu Block - Advanced navigation block with products, widgets, and Instagram feed support (Coming soon)
features.shoppingExperience: Shopping Experience Blocks - Additional custom blocks for enhanced shopping experiences (In development)

success.title: License check successful
success.invalidMessage: License has expired. Please contact support.

error.checkMessage: The license check could not be performed. Please try again later.
